attributes.action: Cap the Council Tax at £10 per Week per household.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Councils waste our money because they know we've got to pay them what they demand. We can not shop around for the best deal like we can with other services and goods.

I propose that all councils be capped at £10 per week so they are forced to stop squandering our money. £10 per week is still £520 per year: if they can not manage on that much then they best look at what non-essential services and staff they can cut!
